text.description: A single text string to be summarized

texts.description: A list of text strings to be summarized separately

file.description: Path to a single file to be read and summarized (read as raw text)

files.description: A list of file paths to be read and summarized separately (each read as raw text)

summary.description: The maximally condensed summary (returned when a single input is provided)

summaries.description: List of maximally condensed summaries (returned when batch inputs are provided)
